eng.details: I offer a wide range of freelance services that include programming, design, and video editing. My skills cover a broad spectrum, from handling the Adobe Suite for design and video editing, to using programming languages like JavaScript and C#, including application development in ReactJS. Additionally, I have experience creating multimedia presentations and utilize tools such as Unity to build interactive experiences. In summary, I am equipped to help with a variety of projects and am willing to work collaboratively with clients to find creative and efficient solutions that meet their needs.

esp.details: Ofrezco servicios en programación, diseño y edición de video con amplia experiencia en la suite Adobe y lenguajes como JavaScript y C#. Creo presentaciones multimedia y experiencias interactivas en Unity. Busco soluciones creativas y eficientes para satisfacer las necesidades de mis clientes.
